description: Asteroids, comets, meteoroids, meteors, and meteorites may seem similar, but each plays a unique role in the Solar System. Asteroids are rocky remnants, comets are icy wanderers, meteors are shooting stars, and meteorites are fragments that survive the plunge to Earth.
title: Asteroids vs Comets vs Meteors vs Meteorites: What Are They and How Are They Different From Each Other?

description: In a historic collaboration, scientists created the first comprehensive mammalian brain activity map. The project, led by the International Brain Laboratory, analyzed data from 600,000 cells across 139 mice. Findings revealed that decision-making and memory are spread across the brain, not confined to specific regions as previously believed.
title: Scientists Map Brain Activity Across 95% of the Mammalian Brain in Landmark Study

description: Witness the epic journey from a victim to a fierce fighter of Shreelavathi only on Ghaati. The movie will release on OTT in October, on Amazon Prime Video.
title: Ghaati Is Now Streaming on Prime Video: Know All About This Anushka Shetty-Starrer

description: Su From So is a Kannada horror comedy. It is about Sulochana's exorcism from Someshwara, which is now streaming on Jio Hotstar.
title: Su From So Now Streaming on JioHotstar: All You Need to Know About This Kannada Horror Comedy

description: Ekaa, directed by Rohit Padaki, blends emotions and actions and is played by Yuva Rajkumar, the lead. His performance and the movie's theme have kept the fans hooked. The film follows a small-town thug who, due to a few incidents, gets trapped in the underworld of Bangalore.
title: Yuva Rajkumar-Starrer Ekka OTT Release: Know When, Where to Watch the Kannada Action Drama Online

description: Swiggy Instamart on Saturday announced its first-ever annual sale, called the Instamart Quick India Movement 2025. Marketed as the country’s “quickest sale,” the event promises 10-minute deliveries on all orders. The launch comes at a strategic time, with Amazon and Flipkart also preparing for their flagship sales. Both the Amazon Great Indian Festival and the Flipkart Big Billion Days are scheduled to begin on September 23.
title: Swiggy Instamart Quick India Movement 2025 Sale Announced, to Offer Deals on iPhone 17 Series and More

description: Apple is facing a new lawsuit filed on Friday, accusing the company of training its artificial intelligence (AI) on copyrighted books. The complaint, brought forward by two authors, claims that pirated copies of their works were included in the datasets used to train OpenELM, the open-source AI model Apple introduced last year.
title: Apple Faces Lawsuit Over Allegedly Training Its AI Models on Copyrighted Books

description: Flipkart has confirmed that its Big Billion Days sale will kick off on September 23. The e-commerce giant has not disclosed the full list of discounted products yet, but a new promotional teaser suggests that Apple’s iPhone 16 Pro Max could be available for under Rs. 1,00,000 during the event. This would mark the first time the handset is being offered at such a low price.
title: Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale: iPhone 16 Pro Max Price to Drop Under Rs. 1 Lakh

description: Blink Charging will integrate cryptocurrency payments across its Blink Network by the end of 2025. The initiative will allow EV drivers to pay for charging sessions with digital assets through the Blink App. The company has over 93,000 charging stations worldwide and sees this move as aligning transportation with the future of finance.
title: Blink Charging to Support Crypto Payments Across Entire EV Charging Network by 2025-End

description: With the iPhone 17 series launch just days away, here's a look at a year-old model on factors that matter a lot for consumers—the camera, battery and performance. The iPhone 17 is likely to bring some massive changes, including a new design, finally! So, should you wait for the latest iPhones or go for the iPhone 16 Pro Max? Here's our brutally honest re-review after 365 days, where we tell you if it's still a pro, or just old news?
title: iPhone 16 Pro Max Re-reviewed: The Camera, Battery, and Performance After a Year of Use

description: The launch of Samsung’s Galaxy S26 series is still months away, but fresh leaks over the past few days have revealed key details about its design and appearance. On Friday, a tipster shared images of the series’ dummy units, suggesting a major design shift. Soon after, leaked CAD renders of the Galaxy S26 Edge highlighted a prominent rectangular camera island.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra and S26 Pro: First Leaked Renders Have Arrived and Here's What You Can Expect

description: Apple will unveil its iPhone 17 series at the “Awe Dropping” event on September 9. Yet even before the launch, several smartphone case makers have begun listing accessories for the unannounced models. The cases feature almost identical dimensions and cut-outs, lending weight to leaked specifications of the devices. One manufacturer has even showcased a case for the iPhone 17 Air, a model that Apple has not confirmed.
title: Apple's iPhone 17 Launch Spoiled by Case Leak: We Explain How They Do It

description: Earlier this week, the Indian Computer Emergency Response Team (CERT-In) released an advisory warning of multiple security flaws impacting smartphones on recent Android versions. The agency noted that a significant number of these vulnerabilities have been assigned unique CVE identifiers and rated them as high severity, given their potential to enable cyberattacks.
title: Android Security Alert: Billions of Devices at High Risk, Warns CERT-In; Android 15, 16 Affected

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 Edge could reportedly feature an iPhone-like camera island. As per the report, the next generation of the Edge series could feature a horizontal edge-to-edge rectangular camera module, similar to the ones reported to feature in the upcoming iPhone 17 Pro models. Additionally, the Galaxy S26 Edge is said to replace the Plus variant in next year’s lineup.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Edge CAD Renders Tease iPhone-Like Camera Island, Thinner Body: Report
